title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.
descriptions:
The student response includes none of these criteria.

  • End behavior on the right with limit notation

  • End behavior on the left with limit notation

  • End behavior on the right and end behavior on the left, without limit notation, or with a maximum of one error in the presentation of the correct limit notation

The student response includes one of these criteria.

  • End behavior on the right with limit notation

  • End behavior on the left with limit notation

  • End behavior on the right and end behavior on the left, without limit notation, or with a maximum of one error in the presentation of the correct limit notation

The student response includes both of these criteria.

  • End behavior on the right with limit notation

  • End behavior on the left with limit notation
